benchmark_details.name: KFinEval-Pilot: A Comprehensive Benchmark Suite for Korean Financial Language Understanding
benchmark_details.overview: KFinEval-Pilot is designed to evaluate large language models in the Korean financial domain. It includes over 1,000 questions curated across three areas: financial knowledge, legal reasoning, and financial toxicity, constructed through a semi-automated pipeline.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate the capabilities of large language models in the Korean financial domain and provide a standard framework for assessing financial AI applications.
purpose_and_intended_users.limitations: The current version of KFinEval-Pilot does not comprehensively cover all sub-domains of finance and remains relatively modest in scope.

data.source: Constructed from curated questions derived from financial knowledge resources, legal materials, and toxicity scenarios applicable to the Korean financial context.
data.annotation: Semi-automated generation using GPT-4 prompts with human expert validation.

methodology.calculation: Scores calculated based on the correctness of model responses against expert-validated answers and the coherence of reasoning processes.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better reasoning and knowledge performance, with specific thresholds defined for accuracy and response quality.
methodology.validation: Utilized a multi-step validation involving both initial checks and expert reviews to enhance reliability.

targeted_risks.demographic_analysis: Included demographic considerations for fair evaluation across different user groups.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: Data privacy measures and anonymization procedures include the careful curation of financial scenarios to avoid personal identification.
ethical_and_legal_considerations.data_licensing: Data is collected from publicly available sources under permissive licenses. All uses are compliant with Korean financial regulations.
ethical_and_legal_considerations.compliance_with_regulations: The benchmark has been designed to adhere to the regulatory frameworks of the Korean financial environment.
